titles.title: A resolution designating March 25, 2008, as "National Cerebral Palsy Awareness Day".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR 3/14/2008 S2164-2165)
Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 3/31/2008--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates March 25, 2008, as National Cerebral Palsy Awareness Day.
